rsg.mailchimp.api.campaigns
Class CampaignMethods

java.lang.Object
  rsg.mailchimp.api.MailChimpApi
      rsg.mailchimp.api.campaigns.CampaignMethods

public class CampaignMethods
extends MailChimpApi

Subclass of MailChimpApi for dealing with all campaign-related API functions.

campaignCreate

public java.lang.String campaignCreate(Constants.CampaignType type,
                                       CampaignOptions options,
                                       CampaignContent content)
                                throws MailChimpApiException
Wraps method http://www.mailchimp.com/api/rtfm/campaigncreate.func.php
Convenience method to create a campaign without segmentation or type options

Parameters:
type - the type of campaign to create of type MailChimpCampaignApi.CampaignType
options - the options to use in creating this campaign
content - the content to create this campaign from
Returns:
the id of the created campaign
Throws:
MailChimpApiException

campaignCreate

public java.lang.String campaignCreate(Constants.CampaignType type,
                                       CampaignOptions options,
                                       CampaignContent content,
                                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> segmentOptions,
                                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> typeOptions)
                                throws MailChimpApiException
Wraps method http://www.mailchimp.com/api/rtfm/campaigncreate.func.php
Method to create a campaign

Parameters:
type - the type of campaign to create of type MailChimpCampaignApi.CampaignType
options - the options to use in creating this campaign
content - the content to create this campaign from
segmentOptions - optional (can be null) - a Map of values according to the specification at the API site. See examples or online docs for the values
typeOptions - optional (can be null) - a Map of values according to the specification at the API site. See examples or online docs for the values.
Returns:
the id of the created campaign
Throws:
MailChimpApiException

campiagnShareReport

public SharedReportDetails campiagnShareReport(java.lang.String campaignId,
                                               boolean secured,
                                               java.lang.String password)
                                        throws MailChimpApiException
Wraps method http://www.mailchimp.com/api/rtfm/campaignsharereport.func.php
Convenience method to simply share the report for a campaign. This will return the details of the shared report, which include the URL, title, secure url and password if pertinent

Parameters:
campaignId -
secured - if true, will create a secured report with either the password specified in password parameter, or one created by MailChimp
password - if non-null and secured is true, this will be used as the secure password for the report.
Returns:
the details of the report
Throws:
MailChimpApiException

campaignShareReport

public SharedReportDetails campaignShareReport(java.lang.String campaignId,
                                               java.lang.String emailAddress,
                                               boolean secured,
                                               java.lang.String password)
                                        throws MailChimpApiException
Wraps method http://www.mailchimp.com/api/rtfm/campaignsharereport.func.php
Convenience method to simply share the report for a campaign. This will return the details of the shared report, which include the URL, title, secure url and password if pertinent

Parameters:
campaignId -
emailAddress - the email address to share the report with
secured - if true, will create a secured report with either the password specified in password parameter, or one created by MailChimp
password - if non-null and secured is true, this will be used as the secure password for the report.
Returns:
the details of the report
Throws:
MailChimpApiException

campaignSchedule

public boolean campaignSchedule(java.lang.String campaignId,
                                java.util.Date time,
                                java.util.Date splitTimeB)
                         throws MailChimpApiException
Wraps method http://www.mailchimp.com/api/rtfm/campaignschedule.func.php
Schedules a campaign with an AB-Split "B" time. The time parameter is assumed to be the "A" time

Parameters:
campaignId -
time - NOTE THIS IS ASSUMED TO BE IN GMT, it's up to the calling developer to make sure of the timezone of their date
splitTimeB - NOTE THIS IS ASSUMED TO BE IN GMT, it's up to the calling developer to make sure of the timezone of their date
Returns:
true if successful
Throws:
MailChimpApiException

campaignAbuseReports

public java.util.List<AbuseReport> campaignAbuseReports(java.lang.String campaignId,
                                                        java.lang.Integer start,
                                                        java.lang.Integer limit,
                                                        java.util.Date since)
                                                 throws MailChimpApiException
Wraps method http://www.mailchimp.com/api/rtfm/campaignabusereports.func.php
Get abuse reports for the given campaign

Parameters:
campaignId -
start - if null, will default to 0
limit - if null, will default to API's default (currently 500)
since - if null, will not be sent to the API to limit the results
Returns:
the list, or non-null 0-length list if nothing found
Throws:
MailChimpApiException

campaignAdvice
